column4: who can help me with synaptic "real problem ,i know it from one year" , it can not do apt-get update after the prgram hung?
did you kill the syanptic process?
hangs on middle of get the repos from the net "apt-get update"
does apt-get return a lock file error?
http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/4384 "apt-get update" output the end of the process
a bad header error...hmmmm..never seen that one before
just as a FYI, there are no breezy backports yet, so disabel backports
is there something can i delete like lock file where can i found this cache "i think i needd to delete something"
you are not getting a lock file error though..its a bad header error
did you think the reinstall may help on this [reinstall synaptic]
I would try others solutions before that
to me it looks like a connection issue
